name: Amazon
hint: Largest river by volume in the world, flowing through the world's largest rainforest

name: Parana
hint: Second-longest river in South America, forms part of the Argentina-Paraguay border

name: Orinoco
hint: Major river of Venezuela, one of the longest in South America

name: Sao Francisco
hint: Longest river entirely within Brazil, vital water source for the northeast

name: Magdalena
hint: Principal river of Colombia, flowing north to the Caribbean Sea

name: Uruguay River
hint: River forming the Argentina-Uruguay border, flowing into the Rio de la Plata

name: Tocantins
hint: Major river in central-eastern Brazil, flows into the Amazon estuary

name: Paraguay River
hint: Major tributary of the Parana, flowing through the Pantanal wetlands

name: Putumayo
hint: Amazon tributary forming part of the Colombia-Peru border

name: Rio Negro
hint: Largest blackwater river in the world, major left tributary of the Amazon
